code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Workers=()=>{const[workers,setWorkers]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://localhost:5000";useEffect(()=>{const fetchWorkers=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/admin/workers"));setWorkers(res.data||[]);}catch(err){console.error("Error fetching workers:",err);setError("⚠️ Failed to load worker types.
